thread.title: Tiffany Harris
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Tiffany Harris

author: Tiffany Harris
title: Tiffany Harris
text: Came right to me email and I printed it off to make a little book for myself. It's kind of like having your own personal trainer at home so the price was wonderful at just $40 (I used the 80% discount) The workouts are great and I love that they are staggered to get more intense as you progress. I was very surprised with how intense 28 minutes can be :) I've been mixing these in with my weights and am seeing results.
